description: API Gateway Unified Observability Dashboard - Covers Success Rates, Usage, Throughput, Latency, Business Metrics, Tenant-Level Monitoring, and Infrastructure Health. Implements requirements from Gateway Observability Requirements document.

panels.description: Total number of requests processed during the selected time range. Use the time picker to adjust the period.
panels.title: üì® Total Requests (Time Range)

panels.description: Total successful requests (2xx/3xx) during the selected time range. Use the time picker to adjust the period.
panels.title: ‚úÖ Successful Requests (Time Range)

panels.description: Total failed requests (4xx/5xx) during the selected time range. Use the time picker to adjust the period.
panels.title: ‚ùå Failed Requests (Time Range)

panels.description: Current requests per second being handled by the gateway.
panels.title: ‚ö° Current Request Rate

panels.description: Number of calls per endpoint (URI) during the selected time range. Shows request distribution across different API endpoints. Excludes /prometheus and /health endpoints, and endpoints with zero calls.
panels.title: üìä Endpoint Calls (Time Range)

panels.description: Number of failed calls (4xx/5xx) per endpoint (URI) during the selected time range. Helps identify problematic endpoints. Excludes /prometheus and /health endpoints, and endpoints with zero failed calls.

targets.expr: round(sum by (uri) (increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{datacenter=~"$dc", namespace=~"$namespace", application="gateway", status=~"[45]..", uri!~"/prometheus|/health"}[$__range]))) > 0

panels.title: ‚ùå Failed Endpoint Calls (Time Range)

panels.description: Current percentage of successful HTTP requests (2xx/3xx status codes) over a 5-minute rolling window. Target: ‚â•99% for healthy operation.
panels.title: HTTP Success Rate (Current)

panels.description: Current percentage of server errors (5xx status codes) over a 5-minute rolling window. Critical alert threshold: >15% for 15 minutes.
panels.title: 5xx Error Rate (Current) ‚ö†Ô∏è

panels.description: Current percentage of client errors (4xx status codes) over a 5-minute rolling window. High rates may indicate API misuse or authentication issues.
panels.title: 4xx Error Rate (Current)

panels.description: Current combined 4xx and 5xx error rate over a 5-minute rolling window. Critical alert fires when >15% for 15 minutes.
panels.title: Combined Error Rate (Current) üö®

panels.description: Trend of success and error rates over time. Red threshold line at 15% error rate (critical alert threshold).
panels.title: Success & Error Rate Trend

panels.description: Current requests per second being handled by the gateway.
panels.title: Current Request Rate (RPS)

panels.description: Total number of requests processed during the selected time range.
panels.title: Total Requests (Time Range)

panels.description: Current rate of token validation operations per second over a 5-minute rolling window. Critical for understanding authentication load.
panels.title: Token Validation Rate (Current)

panels.description: Current JVM heap memory usage percentage. Warning alert at 85% sustained for 15 minutes.

targets.expr: avg((jvm_memory_used_bytes{datacenter=~"$dc", namespace=~"$namespace", application="gateway", area="heap"} / jvm_memory_max_bytes{datacenter=~"$dc", namespace=~"$namespace", application="gateway", area="heap"}) and jvm_memory_max_bytes{datacenter=~"$dc", namespace=~"$namespace", application="gateway", area="heap"} > 0) * 100

panels.title: JVM Heap Memory Usage (Current) ‚ö†Ô∏è

panels.description: Request rate over time showing traffic patterns with request count annotations.
panels.title: Request Rate Over Time

panels.description: JVM heap memory usage per pod over time. Warning threshold at 85%.

targets.expr: ((jvm_memory_used_bytes{datacenter=~"$dc", namespace=~"$namespace", application="gateway", area="heap"} / jvm_memory_max_bytes{datacenter=~"$dc", namespace=~"$namespace", application="gateway", area="heap"}) and jvm_memory_max_bytes{datacenter=~"$dc", namespace=~"$namespace", application="gateway", area="heap"} > 0) * 100

panels.title: JVM Heap Memory Usage Over Time

panels.description: Cumulative request count over the selected time period.
panels.title: üì® Request Count Over Time

panels.description: Current average response time over a 5-minute rolling window. Warning alert when sustained above 5 seconds.
panels.title: Average Response Time (Current)

panels.description: Current estimated 95th percentile response time (Avg √ó 2) over a 5-minute rolling window. Warning alert when P95 > 5 seconds for 15 minutes. Note: Histogram buckets not available, using estimation.
panels.title: P95 Latency (Current Est) ‚ö†Ô∏è

panels.description: Current maximum response time observed for successful requests (2xx/3xx status codes).
panels.title: Max Latency - Success (Current)

panels.description: Current maximum response time observed across ALL requests (including errors).
panels.title: Max Latency - All (Current)

panels.description: Response time trend showing Average and estimated P90/P95/P99 percentiles. Red threshold line at 5 seconds (warning alert threshold).
panels.title: Response Time Trend (Avg & Percentile Est)

panels.description: Current average time taken for token validation operations over a 5-minute rolling window. Critical for understanding auth performance.
panels.title: Token Validation Latency (Current)

panels.description: Current percentage of token validation failures over a 5-minute rolling window. High rates indicate auth system issues.
panels.title: Token Validation Error Rate (Current)

panels.description: Total token validations performed during the selected time range.
panels.title: Total Token Validations (Time Range)

panels.description: Current token validation success rate over a 5-minute rolling window. Low rates indicate auth system problems.
panels.title: Token Validation Success Rate (Current)

panels.description: Token validation latency trend over time.
panels.title: Token Validation Latency Over Time

panels.description: Token validation error rate trend. Red threshold at 15%.
panels.title: Token Validation Error Rate Over Time

panels.description: 5xx error rate breakdown by URI endpoint. Helps identify problematic endpoints.

targets.expr:
(
  sum by (uri) (rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{datacenter=~"$dc", namespace=~"$namespace", application="gateway", uri!~"/prometheus|/health", status=~"5.."}[$__rate_interval]))
  /
  sum by (uri) (rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{datacenter=~"$dc", namespace=~"$namespace", application="gateway", uri!~"/prometheus|/health"}[$__rate_interval]))
) * 100
and
sum by (uri) (rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{datacenter=~"$dc", namespace=~"$namespace", application="gateway", uri!~"/prometheus|/health"}[$__rate_interval])) > 0

panels.title: 5xx Error Rate by URI

panels.description: 4xx error rate breakdown by URI endpoint. High rates may indicate client issues or API misuse.

targets.expr:
(
  sum by (uri) (rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{datacenter=~"$dc", namespace=~"$namespace", application="gateway", uri!~"/prometheus|/health", status=~"4.."}[$__rate_interval]))
  /
  sum by (uri) (rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{datacenter=~"$dc", namespace=~"$namespace", application="gateway", uri!~"/prometheus|/health"}[$__rate_interval]))
) * 100
and
sum by (uri) (rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{datacenter=~"$dc", namespace=~"$namespace", application="gateway", uri!~"/prometheus|/health"}[$__rate_interval])) > 0

panels.title: 4xx Error Rate by URI

panels.description: Top 10 slowest endpoints by average response time. Helps identify latency bottlenecks.

targets.expr:
topk(10,
  (
    sum by (uri) (rate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{datacenter=~"$dc", namespace=~"$namespace", application="gateway", uri!~"/prometheus|/health"}[$__rate_interval]))
    /
    sum by (uri) (rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{datacenter=~"$dc", namespace=~"$namespace", application="gateway", uri!~"/prometheus|/health"}[$__rate_interval]))
  )
  and
  sum by (uri) (rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{datacenter=~"$dc", namespace=~"$namespace", application="gateway", uri!~"/prometheus|/health"}[$__rate_interval])) > 0
)

panels.title: Top 10 End-to-End Latency by URI

panels.description: Request count breakdown by URI endpoint (stacked view).
panels.title: üì® Request Count by URI

panels.description: Request count breakdown by HTTP status code.
panels.title: üì® Request Count by HTTP Status Code

panels.description: Gateway deployment replica status showing available and unavailable pods.
panels.title: Gateway Service Deployment Status

panels.description: CPU usage per gateway pod in millicores.
panels.title: Gateway Service CPU Usage

panels.description: Memory usage per gateway pod (working set bytes).
panels.title: Gateway Service Memory Usage

title: DS Gateway API - Unified Observability
